Xinu Port to Pentium Processors

Principal Investigator: Douglas E. Comer

Research Assistant: D. Stevens

We are porting the Xinu operating system to the Pentium processor. The work is motivated in three ways. First, we are interested in assessing the performance of Xinu compared to systems that run only on Intel processors. Second, the Crosspoint project, which is investigating wireless internetworking, is using Pentium machines as wireless base stations, and will use Xinu for protocol experimentation. Third, students in operations system and network classes will be using Xinu for hands-on experimentation.

CS Annual Report - 19 APR 1996
